data.eml:eml: Taxonomic changes and description of two new species for the Phyllodactylus lanei complex (Gekkota: Phyllodactylidae) in Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramírez-Reyes, Tonatiuh, Flores-Villela, Oscar (2018): Taxonomic changes and description of two new species for the Phyllodactylus lanei complex (Gekkota: Phyllodactylidae) in Mexico. Zootaxa 4407 (2): 151-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.2.1
